summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Prompt Manager landing page and authentication system. Landing page loads correctly with all required marketing content, pricing plans, and GitHub OAuth integration. Protected routes properly redirect unauthenticated users. Backend APIs working correctly except GitHub OAuth which requires credentials configuration.

flaky_endpoints.workaround: GitHub OAuth credentials (GITHUB_CLIENT_ID, GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET) need to be configured in environment variables

passed_tests: Landing page loads at / with hero section, features, and pricing
Pricing section shows Free ($0, 1 prompt) and Pro ($9.99/month, unlimited)
Sign in with GitHub button is visible and clickable on landing page
Backend /api/auth/status returns authenticated: false when not logged in
Protected routes redirect to landing page when not authenticated
Templates API works correctly (GET /api/templates returns 4 templates)
API Keys CRUD operations working correctly
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
action_item_for_main_agent: Configure GitHub OAuth credentials (GITHUB_CLIENT_ID, GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET) in backend/.env to enable full GitHub OAuth testing. The OAuth flow structure is implemented correctly but requires actual GitHub app credentials.

success_percentage.backend: 89% (8/9 tests passed - GitHub OAuth needs credentials)
